meanings.definition: An enzyme found in pineapple juice and in the stem and fruit of the pineapple plant.
meanings.sent1: Bromelain helps break down food in our stomachs.
meanings.sent2: I added bromelain to the smoothie for extra digestion support.
meanings.sent3: The pineapple's bromelain was on a mission to make the salad tastier.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as refreshing as the pineapple's bromelain.
meanings.sent5: The bromelain in the pineapple was like a little digestive superhero.

meanings.definition: A substance extracted from the stem and fruit of the pineapple plant, used as a meat tenderizer and in the treatment of inflammation and swelling.
meanings.sent1: The chef used bromelain to make the meat softer before cooking.
meanings.sent2: Bromelain is known for its anti-inflammatory properties.
meanings.sent3: The bromelain in the marinade turned the tough steak into a tender delight.
meanings.sent4: Her soothing words acted like bromelain on his emotional wounds.
meanings.sent5: The bromelain's magic touch eased the swelling in her ankle.
